doc:
Marj Dusay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marj_Dusay 0 Marj Dusay (; born Marjorie Ellen Pivonka Mahoney on February 20, 1936, in Russell, Kansas) is an American actress known for her roles on American soap operas. She is especially known for her role as Alexandra Spaulding on Guiding Light, a role she played on and off, from 1993 through the show's 2009 cancellation, as well as playing the wife of Douglas MacArthur in the 1977 movie MacArthur. Marj_Dusay ( ; born Marjorie_Ellen_Pivonka_Mahoney on February_20_,_1936 , in Russell , Kansas ) is an_American_actress known for her_roles on American_soap_operas . She is_especially_known for her_role as Alexandra_Spaulding on Guiding_Light , a_role she played on_and_off , from 1993 through the_show 's_2009_cancellation , as_well_as playing the_wife of Douglas_MacArthur in the_1977_movie_MacArthur .
